faq.admission_process: To apply, please visit our website and complete the online application form. Required documents include birth certificate, previous school records, and immunization records.
faq.tuition_fees: Tuition fees vary by grade level. Please contact the admissions office for current rates and payment plans.
faq.uniform_policy: School uniforms are mandatory and can be purchased from our designated supplier. Details are available on our website.
faq.transportation: School bus service is available for students living within the designated zones. Please contact student services for route information.
faq.lunch_program: We offer both hot lunch and cold lunch options. Menus are published monthly on our website.

courses_offered.mathematics: Comprehensive math curriculum from algebra to calculus.
courses_offered.science: Biology, Chemistry, and Physics courses available.
courses_offered.literature: English literature and creative writing programs.
courses_offered.computer_science: Coding, algorithms, and web development courses.
courses_offered.arts: Visual arts, music, and drama classes.
